Name: Payroll
About the game: The only good office worker is a good office worker. - Sun Tzu Play through the career of an office worker, and enjoy the thrills and chills that only an office can offer. The point of the game is to figure out the point of the game, so only the most diligent employee will thrive in this harsh world... Features: MIDI music. 640x480px resolution. 256 colors. Adlib sound effects. Daily missions (with a real progression) Exploration. Easter eggs and secrets. No TPS reports. Achievements.
